name: test_e2e_with_logs[026_SQLI_BLIND_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BLIND_005` |
| **Name** | Conditional error-based blind injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT CASE WHEN (1=1) THEN 1 ELSE (SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2) END)=1 --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20CASE%20WHEN%20%281%3D1%29%20THEN%201%20ELSE%20%28SELECT%201%20UNION%20SELECT%202%29%20END%29%3D1%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~71000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:35:42.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_005-1771076142873-e6v29r pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_005 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20CASE%20WHEN%20%281%3D1%29%20THEN%201%20ELSE%20%28SELECT%201%20UNION%20SELECT%202%29%20END%29%3D1%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_005-1771076142873-e6v29r pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_005 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20CASE%20WHEN%20%281%3D1%29%20THEN%201%20ELSE%20%28SELECT%201%20UNION%20SELECT%202%29%20END%29%3D1%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
